sentences.sContent: To say that all motorists speed in residential areas is overstating the case.
sentences.sCn: 说所有驾驶员都在住宅区内超速行驶是言过其实了。

sentences.sContent: The importance of a child’s early years cannot be overstated (= is very important ).
sentences.sCn: 儿童幼年期的重要性怎么强调也不为过。

words.tran: 夸大；夸张；过分强调（overstate的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: to talk about something in a way that makes it seem more important, serious etc than it really is
